title: Blue essence
body:
SnFuBaR
i had a quest that would give me 
10 000 blue essence
7 500 blue essence
thats how it was in the quest one above the other
while i had about 10 000 to begin with so i should have ended with 27 500 ish but i didnt get any essence after i had played a game and now the quest is gone

replies.body: Make sure you go into your loot and open up the orbs that mission gave you!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mg8csElc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-13T23:16:35.005+0000)
>
> Make sure you go into your loot and open up the orbs that mission gave you!

why i didn't get the mission???
